entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then periods of light snow changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
